name: David Picker
description:
Name David Picker
Born in 1895s in England
There are five people in David's family.
David is the oldest brother in the house. His house was in the middle-of-poverty.
As a result, when he young David had to be a newspaper delivery boy in order to have money to go to school. He had a dream that one day he would become a famous writer.
But in the end he couldn't do it. at the age of 20 David was discouraged while World War I was halfway through. He thought that going into battle would be the best.
he left the dream Better go and fight for the honor of the country.

in the 1915s
Several explosions erupted at the defensive line. David glanced at his best friend, who was injured in his leg, unable to walk. David rushes through the bullets to save his friend, but unfortunately, while carrying his friend on his back, There was an explosion.
causing David's right eye is blind and his right arm is torn.
and His friend died instantly.

in the 1966s
David at the age of 71 He still remember the past.
He has written a book called snowblood
What will the past be like? He will remember and try to live in the end to be happy.
